artist: Designer: Georg Jensen; Maker: Georg Jensen, Copenhagen, Denmark
creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: large unadorned bowl with scalloped rim alternating smooth and ribbed design, classical style foot tapering to an open work stem of stylized leaves and stems with flowers
markings: under foot at center: [DENMARK] (crown)/oval [GEORG JENSEN] [19B] oval [GI/925/5] [STERLING]
title: Compote
